overview: cosmos-war-finally-love is a triptych about sequential and spatial indeterminacy. Linearity imposes a closed and rigid hierarchy of sensory organisation based on a fixed, external, geometrically positioned observer and narrative. Cosmos-war-finally-love incorporates the nebulous and swarming character of indeterminacy and ambiguity as opening to expand the plasticity of our transmodal connections, ultimately activating expanded telepathy.
title: cosmos-war-finally-love
